parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The name of the edge instance.

parameters.name: IotInstanceId
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 30. Default value: 10. If you specify a value smaller than 1, the system uses 10.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The error code. Success indicates that the call was successful. Other values indicate that specific errors occurred. For more information, see [Error codes](~~135200~~).

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of the page from which the results are displayed. The minimum value is 1. If you specify a value smaller than 1, the system uses 1.
